meanings.meaning: 1. or; otherwise
2. furthermore; also
3. perhaps; by some chance; possibly Archaic
4. that being said; be that as it may Archaic
5. however; but Archaic
6. not to mention; needless to say Archaic
7. as expected; sure enough Archaic
8. really; at all Archaic, used to express emphatic denial, suspicion, or emotion
当 【はた】
1. this; our; the ... in question; the said ... See also 当の
2. right; justice; fairness See also 当を得る
3. checking account Abbreviation, See also 当座預金
4. Tou
1. at that time; in those days
2. Touji
1. at that time; in those days
2. Touji
1. to hit かろうじて車に当てられずにすんだ。I narrowly escaped being hit by a car.
2. to expose この薬品は日光に当てないようにしなさい。Don't expose this chemical to direct sunlight.
3. to apply (e.g. patch); to put on; to put against; to hold on; to hold against その金は体育館の建設に当てられた。The money was appropriated for building the gymnasium.
4. to allot; to call on someone (e.g. in class)
5. to guess (an answer) うまくあの先生のやまを当てたわね。You've sure got the teacher's number.
6. to make a hit (e.g. in a lottery) 彼は前回の好景気の間に財産を株取り引きのあてた。He amassed a fortune in stock trading during the last boom.
1. to hit かろうじて車に当てられずにすんだ。I narrowly escaped being hit by a car.
2. to expose この薬品は日光に当てないようにしなさい。Don't expose this chemical to direct sunlight.
3. to apply (e.g. patch); to put on; to put against; to hold on; to hold against その金は体育館の建設に当てられた。The money was appropriated for building the gymnasium.
4. to allot; to call on someone (e.g. in class)
5. to guess (an answer) うまくあの先生のやまを当てたわね。You've sure got the teacher's number.
6. to make a hit (e.g. in a lottery) 彼は前回の好景気の間に財産を株取り引きのあてた。He amassed a fortune in stock trading during the last boom.

sentences.translation: I narrowly escaped being hit by a car.
Don't expose this chemical to direct sunlight.
The money was appropriated for building the gymnasium.
You've sure got the teacher's number.
He amassed a fortune in stock trading during the last boom.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb

meanings.meaning: 4. to be right on the money (of a prediction, criticism, etc.) 不思議な話だが、彼の予言は当たった。Strange to say, his prediction has come true.

meanings.meaning: 1. exactly; just; precisely; really; truly; surely; certainly; without doubt Usually written using kana aloneＤＴＰで本を作れば、安いし早いし、まさに一挙両得だ。Desktop publishing lets you produce books quickly and cheaply. It's like killing two birds with one stone.
2. right (when); just (as) Usually written using kana aloneあなたの電話が鳴ったときまさに出かけようとするところだった。I was about to leave when you telephoned.
3. just (about to); on the point of; on the verge of; on the brink of Usually written using kana alone, also written as 将に
4. really (ought to); certainly (should); naturally Usually written using kana alone, as まさに...べき; also written as 当に

1. exactly; just; precisely; really; truly; surely; certainly; without doubt Usually written using kana aloneＤＴＰで本を作れば、安いし早いし、まさに一挙両得だ。Desktop publishing lets you produce books quickly and cheaply. It's like killing two birds with one stone.
2. right (when); just (as) Usually written using kana aloneあなたの電話が鳴ったときまさに出かけようとするところだった。I was about to leave when you telephoned.
3. just (about to); on the point of; on the verge of; on the brink of Usually written using kana alone, also written as 将に
4. really (ought to); certainly (should); naturally Usually written using kana alone, as まさに...べき; also written as 当に

sentences.translation: Desktop publishing lets you produce books quickly and cheaply. It's like killing two birds with one stone.
I was about to leave when you telephoned.

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Na-adjective (keiyodoshi), Noun
meanings.meaning: 1. natural; reasonable; obvious 我々は彼が成功したのは当たり前だと思った。We took his success for granted.

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Na-adjective (keiyodoshi), Noun
meanings.meaning: 2. usual; common; ordinary; commonplace; the norm この問題はあたりまえのやり方では解決しない。You cannot solve this problem in an ordinary way.
当り前 【あたりまえ】、あたり前 【あたりまえ】、当りまえ 【あたりまえ】

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Na-adjective (keiyodoshi)
meanings.meaning: 1. natural; right; proper; just; reasonable; appropriate; deserved 彼が息子の自慢をするのは当然だ。It is only natural that he be proud of his son.
2. naturally; as a matter of course; rightly; deservedly; justly; of course ボルボ衝突したので、うちの車の方が当然ひどい目にあった。In the collision with a Volvo, our car naturally got the worst of it.
当前 【とうぜん】
当前: Ateji (phonetic) reading, Rarely-used kanji form.

sentences.translation: It is only natural that he be proud of his son.
In the collision with a Volvo, our car naturally got the worst of it.

meanings.type: Noun, Suru verb, Intransitive verb, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 1. corresponding to (in meaning, function, etc.); being equivalent to その語に相当するようなフランス語を知っていますか。Do you know the French equivalent of the word?

meanings.type: Na-adjective (keiyodoshi), Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 2. appropriate; suitable; befitting; proportionate それを発明した教授は大学から相当の対価を受ける権利がある。The professor who invented it has the right to reasonable remuneration from the university.
3. to be proportionate to; to be in keeping with; to be deserving of; to be worthy of アメリカへの旅は彼女にとって２年間の給与に相当した。A trip to America was equivalent to a two-year salary for her.

meanings.type: Na-adjective (keiyodoshi), Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 4. considerable; substantial １０年といえば相当な時間だ。Ten years is a long time.
5. considerably; rather; quite; fairly; pretty その場所は今は相当建て込んでいる。The place is very much built up now.

sentences.translation: Do you know the French equivalent of the word?
The professor who invented it has the right to reasonable remuneration from the university.
A trip to America was equivalent to a two-year salary for her.
Ten years is a long time.
The place is very much built up now.
